title: Court Order Redesign Concept
description: Full UX Evaluation for Court Order - a South African Sneaker and Apparel marketplace. Included heuristic evaluation, discovery sessions, stakeholder interviews, and brand bible updates.

title: PriceCheck Redesign
description: Redesign project for PriceCheck e-commerce platform focusing on minimalist, performant, and user-friendly experience. Collaborated with founder to rebuild the platform.

title: Quick App for Network Provider
description: 2-week sprint to deliver a ready-for-development app concept. Focused on user research, business case analysis, and gamification rules for network provider client.

title: Intergate Immigration
description: Immigration services website for South Africa with streamlined application processes, document management, and client portal for visa and immigration services.

title: Intergate Emigration
description: Emigration services website for Australia, New Zealand & South Africa with comprehensive guides, application tracking, and expert consultation booking.

title: NotNormal - Friday Five
description: Platform to get design portfolios featured to thousands of LinkedIn followers every Friday. Submission platform connecting designers with job opportunities and community recognition.

title: Pull North CV Builder
description: Yachting CV creation platform with guided forms, shareable URLs, and industry-standard formatting for premium yacht job applications.

title: Travel Itinerary App
description: Comprehensive travel planning app with real-time updates and collaborative trip management.

title: Taxi App
description: Startup taxi app design for South African market with simplified user flows for drivers, passengers, and owners. Designed for low-grade smartphones.

title: TabBoard
description: Advanced tab session manager for Chrome that transforms your browsing workflow with smart session saving and lightning-fast restoration.
